biotools.summary: Cancer-Driving Site Profiling DataBase (CanDriS) is a platform to comprehensively proflie the cancer-driving sites at the pan-cancer and tumor-type level for the somatic mutations collected from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA PanCanAtlas project) and International Cancer Genome Consortium (ICGC) (ICGC Release 25) by an in-house method CanDriS.

bioschemas.name: CanDriS
bioschemas.summary: Cancer-Driving Site Profiling DataBase (CanDriS) is a platform to comprehensively proflie the cancer-driving sites at the pan-cancer and tumor-type level for the somatic mutations collected from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA PanCanAtlas project) and International Cancer Genome Consortium (ICGC) (ICGC Release 25) by an in-house method CanDriS.
